channel.title: At what point can I send private messages?
channel.description: There seems to be a concept of private messages on this discussion forum. But I don't seem to have any access to it. How do I "achieve" or "unlock" access to private messages?

item.title: At what point can I send private messages?
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Yeah, I hear Droplr is down. Basically post 5 topics, read 50 topics, read for 15 minutes of time. I believe these are OR so any one of these will do it. Since I know you though I’ll move you now.

Read full topic
item.source: At what point can I send private messages?

item.description:

item.title: At what point can I send private messages?
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
These are the current settings to become a basic level user which would let you send private messages

d.pr

Screen Shot 2013-10-07 at 13.19.43.png

Shared with Droplr

I believe doing any of those will move you to the next level which allows most things.

Read full topic
